post.body: Sent you a direct message
yummy!
Want a quick and easy table that you can just put in by typing it in when hitting the HTML tab?
Easily fixable.
That's because the database information in the options table is set for the wordpress dir, we have to fix that
If you had time we should set your wordpress into the root =)
There are a few minor CSS changes, but since it looks like you know what you're doing it shouldn't be difficult at all for you
@onebrightlight yeah onebright's on the right track he can lead you to some additions that will help if not I can do it
Yeap
.. tables, what do you need tables for?
I'm going to wait until they have the scheme templete based for the sub areas
The Bump and Grind
oh how generic!
You could do a play on words like .. The "Iggy Lancefree" Pub
Sounds Regal to me, so yeah
The Dragonlords Inn
The Dragonlords Inn
lol
